## Protocol.Input.DispatchMouseEventRequest.buttons property

A number indicating which buttons are pressed on the mouse when a mouse event is triggered. Left=1, Right=2, Middle=4, Back=8, Forward=16, None=0.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
buttons?: integer;
```
